org.ldaptive.ssl

Class SslConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ldaptive.AbstractConfig
      • org.ldaptive.ssl.SslConfig

  • public class SslConfig
extends AbstractConfig
    Contains all the configuration data for SSL and startTLS. Providers are not guaranteed to support all the options contained here.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private CredentialConfig credentialConfig
      Configuration for the trust and authentication material to use for SSL and startTLS.
